title: TFW: Your support Ezreal gets mad at someone picking ADC Janna

replies.body: So many things wrong with this. but i still like the people who will swear by leblanc adc if mid is taken.
i like to take ASol adc, he shouts with his aa so i call it the Laughing Dragon
plus all the boops. Does he talk as much as the obnoxious noxian{{champion:119}} though ?
Hey man...I used to do ADC {{champion:40}} back in Season 3 with my friends and most of the time it worked out back then lol.
